page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: The people in our area have a choice of public transport; trains, taxis, and buses .However, the trains are just out of the area.Most of the older people tend to rely on public transport while the younger people usually have their own vehicles, such as a motor bike or small car.In our survey most families have at least one car, some two and sometimes even three The fuel our vehicles use is becoming quite scarce and the price is steadily going up.At the moment it is almost two pounds a gallon,but this has not deterred people from driving their cars.The reason that cars are more popular than buses and trains is that the car provides a door to door service.
